#summary Maven repository and usage instructions

= Repository =

{{{
<project>
	...
	<repositories>
		<repository>
		  <id>jnaerator</id>
		  <name>JNAerator Maven Repository</name>
		  <url>http://jnaerator.sourceforge.net/maven</url>
		</repository>
	</repositories>
	<pluginRepositories>
        	<pluginRepository>
			  <id>jnaerator</id>
			  <url>http://jnaerator.sourceforge.net/maven</url>
	        </pluginRepository>
	</pluginRepositories>
	...
</project>
}}}

= Usage = 

JNAerator-runtime :
{{{
<dependencies>
  <dependency>
    <groupId>com.jnaerator</groupId>
    <artifactId>jnaerator-runtime</artifactId>
    <version>0.9.1</version>
    <scope>compile</scope>
  </dependency>
</dependencies>
}}}
